news.title: News & Updates
news.subtitle: Stay up to date with news, projects and developments at Mayer Elektro.

article1.title: New office building successfully electrified
article1.description: We have completed the complete electrical installation for TechCorp's new office building. The project included modern smart building technologies.

article2.title: New apprenticeships for 2025
article2.description: From September 2025, we are again offering apprenticeships as electricians for energy and building technology. Applications are possible from now on.

article3.title: Industry 4.0 certification received
article3.description: Our automation department has been successfully certified according to Industry 4.0 standards. This confirms our competence in modern manufacturing technologies.

article4.title: Smart Home Trends 2025
article4.description: Discover the latest smart home trends for 2025. From intelligent lighting to fully automated home control - we show you the possibilities.

article5.title: 24/7 emergency service now available
article5.description: From now on, we offer our emergency service around the clock. In case of power outages or other electrical emergencies, we are there for you at any time.

article6.title: ISO 9001 quality certificate renewed
article6.description: We have successfully renewed our ISO 9001 quality certificate. This confirms our high quality standard in all areas of our work.
